detail_desc: Fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with short, flounced sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Tops in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in an airy viscose weave with a concealed zip. Decorative covered buttons and a high split at one side. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a smocked stand-up collar and opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Off-the-shoulder dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave. Double-layered with elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable, braided belt at the waist and rounded hem.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Double-layered hat in fine-knit wool with a small imitation leather appliqué at the hem.
Longer cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave. High waist with pleats for added width, discreet side pockets and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details and a smart stretch function so that the shorts embrace the body for a comfortable and flattering fit. High waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Short, straight-cut dress in a cotton weave with a resort collar, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Long metal earrings with pearly plastic beads. Length 6.5 cm.

Multicoloured trainers in imitation leather with shimmering details. Padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Linings and insoles in mesh made from partly recycled polyester. Sturdy patterned rubber soles.

Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in soft, organic slub cotton jersey. Dress with a press-stud on one shoulder and flutter sleeves. Puff pants with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and around the legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in organic cotton denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and extra-wide legs that taper to the hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in hard-washed slub jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with decorative seams front and back. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace hipster briefs with a mid, V-shape waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Short jacket in soft pile with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Jersey lining.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Length 5 cm.
Ankle-length cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit. Regular waist with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket. Wide, straight legs with flap leg pockets.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Wide foldover hem with an appliqué on the front.
Boxy-style jumper in a jacquard knit with a soft, brushed finish. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a foldover edge in faux fur at the top and a decorative grosgrain bow at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Long-sleeved boiler suit in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons at the front. Open chest pockets, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover waistband. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Ankle-length treggings in sturdy jersey with fine details. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and side pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.
Short-sleeved top in patterned slub jersey with a V-neck and gathers in the sides for a more comfortable fit.

Short, off-the-shoulder, flared dress in a crêpe weave with broderie anglaise. Elastication and a small flounce at the top, long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short, wide parka woven in a cotton blend with a slight sheen. High collar, large hood with a peak and drawstring, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Seam at the waist with a loose yoke, diagonal flap side pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Long dolman sleeves with a hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer a the back. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit set in a soft silk and cotton blend. Long-sleeved jumper with buttons at the top and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and roll-edge hems.
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders,long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Short, pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups and wide, adjustable shoulder straps.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed, gently draping viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Hat in braided straw with a flat crown. Width of brim 8 cm.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.

Dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with smocking and a decorative flounce at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves, a narrow elasticated frill-trimmed seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder, knee-length dress in a patterned weave with elastication at the top and short, flounced trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Hat in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with an imitation leather appliqué, faux fur pompom on the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck, long sleeves, seam at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Sleeveless, one-shoulder dress in soft jersey. Wide flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow shoulder strap over the open shoulder. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, padded jacket with a jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Short lace dress with a concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Tapered legs with open pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairbands in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Unlined.

Lace push-up bra with narrow, crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft jersey top in a slightly longer style with long sleeves.
Set with a top, trousers and hat in cotton. Long-sleeved top with a concealed button on one shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Double-layered jersey hat.
Skirt in a slightly stretchy weave with a concealed zip and slit at the back. Lined.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in airy, striped jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, jersey-lined skirt.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Thin running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Hood with a small peak, zipped, diagonal chest pocket, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Mesh lining.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
Wallet in leather with six card compartments, one note compartment and one outer compartment. Lined. Size 1.5x8x10 cm.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
